mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_paper ( paper_id, student_user, teacher_user, paper_name, total_grade, status, type,upload_time ) VALUES ( #{paperId}, #{studentUser}, #{teacherUser}, #{paperName}, #{totalGrade}, #{status}, #{type},#{uploadTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT paper_id from review_paper where teacher_user=#{teacherUser} GROUP BY paper_id
SELECT student_user, paper_name, total_grade FROM review_paper WHERE STATUS = 1 AND paper_id = #{paperId}
SELECT id, student_user, teacher_user, paper_name, total_grade, STATUS, type, upload_time FROM review_paper WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} AND teacher_user = #{teacherUser} ORDER BY status,upload_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO show_review_question ( review_id, question_id, upload_answer ) VALUES (#{reviewId},#{questionId},#{uploadAnswer} )
